text.headline: The space battle of Medusa
text.text: During a hard fought battle against the corruption from the deep dark, light got eaten by the dark and only a few remained. A small crew of heros that swore to never forgive and never forget what was lost on that day. And to make ends meat with the caos.

text.headline:
TimelineJS
Easy-to-make, beautiful timelines.
text.text: TimelineJS is a populair tool from Knightlab. It has been used by more than 250,000 people to tell stories seen hundreds of millions of times, and is available in more than sixty languages.

text.headline:
Streamlit Components
version 0.63.0
text.text: Streamlit lets you turn data scripts into sharable web apps in minutes, not weeks. It's all Python, open-source, and free! And once you've created an app you can use our free sharing platform to deploy, manage, and share your app with the world.

text.headline: Streamlit TimelineJS component
text.text:
Started with a demo on https://www.innerdoc.com/nlp-timeline/ .
Then made a Streamlit component of it.
Then made a PyPi package for it.
